name: Jump! Mouse
description:
Jump through platforms to reach your precious cheese before the cat reaches you.
Beware that he gets quicker when you are to distant of him.

PRESS THE CONFIRM BUTTONS IN THE MAIN SCREEN TO GO TO LEVEL SELECTOR.

Controls

  • Arrow Keys / 8465 - Move
  • C / Enter / 5 - Confirm in the menus
  • You can go off the screen to the left or right to wrap around.

Credits

  • Sounds from the official Nokia 3310 jam resources page by Trix.

Made for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 5
